normalised: Been hooked on athlete biographies lately! Reading about Sachin Tendulkar's early days at Shivaji Park and his journey to becoming a legend is truly inspiring. Reminds me of that scene in Chak De! India, you know? Anyone else read P. T. Usha's bio? Heard it's amazing. Also, any recommendations for books on cricketers besides the usual ones? I'm especially interested in stories from Ranji Trophy.
